titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Donald M. Payne, a Representative from the State of New Jersey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/6/2012--Passed House without amendment. Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Donald M. Payne, a Representative from New Jersey. Declares that when the House adjourns on March 6, 2012, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of the deceased.
